sentence.Network_en: The old stone cattle trough still sits by the main entrance.
sentence.Network_cn: 陈旧的石制牛食槽仍然放在大门口。

sentence.Network_en: Outside, two old boys lingered on the street corner discussing cattle.
sentence.Network_cn: 两个老头儿在外面街角迟迟不走，聊着牛的事情。

sentence.Network_en: Cowboys drove covered wagons and rode horses, lassoing cattle.
sentence.Network_cn: 牛仔们有的赶着大篷车，有的骑着马，抛套索捕牛。

jushi.english: The cattle were driven down the hill.
All the farm workers had to help to haul the bags of cattle food down from the cart.
